channel.title: Creative Archive
channel.description: Don't miss out on novelties from The Creative Archive!

item.title: Tiaradventur
item.description:
About Tiaradventur
A desperate Princess, on a quest to find seven stolen tiaras, asks for your help. As a Hero in the making, you must not refuse, even in the face of danger! As the story unfolds, you may get to know the Princess better and understand what really is at stake. The legend of Tiar...

item.title: Guestbook
item.description: The Guestbook of the Creative Archive

item.title: Hastefulll
item.description:
About Hastefulll Hastefulll is a simple 7-level puzzle platformer about trying to leave a mark everywhere, as fast as possible. However, too much haste may have negative consequences! Fill the board, but plan wisely. Haste makes waste!

item.title: Hall of Fame
item.description: Hall of fame: winners of Pedro PSI's challenges.

item.title: Play Mini Gemini Replay (PMGRP)
item.description:
About Play Mini Gemini Replay (PMGRP) Play Mini Gemini Replay (PMGRP) is a mini puzzle platformer about cooperating with your future self to reach your goals. Plan your limited moves wisely, play and replay all 11 levels!
How to playControls - keyboard Play mode Move with the Arrow keys. When th...

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
The Creative Archive does not collect personal data as defined in GDPR's Article 4. Nevertheless, whenever you choose to communicate any personal data, your privacy and GDPR will be respected. Moreover, the Creative Archive is designed to minimise privacy risks. Here's how!
